stories.fantasy_headline: Alchemists Uncover Ancient Magic of Heat and Motion!
stories.fantasy_story: Long ago, the esteemed Count Rumford showed that heat is not a mystical essence but can be conjured endlessly through simple movement. This wisdom formed the bedrock for understanding how energy and disorder behave. Now, wise alchemists are applying these profound principles to the very fabric of tiny spirit particles.

stories.fantasy_headline: Shared Quarters Share Tiny Belly Creatures, Say Healers!
stories.fantasy_story: Healers studying many rodents have found that the tiny creatures dwelling within one's belly are shaped by both personal bloodline magic and the bloodline magic of those living nearby. Certain family traits encourage specific microbes that can pass between companions in a dwelling. This reveals how intimately even our smallest beings are connected.

stories.fantasy_headline: The Great Saga of Pluribus Hints at Many Untold Chapters Ahead!
stories.fantasy_story: It gladdens the heart that the grand saga of Pluribus shall continue with a new chapter. The final viewing of this first part, crafted by the master storyteller Vince Gilligan for the Guild of Scribes, made it clear the tale has only just begun. Many threads were brought together, promising more adventures to come.
